project_name.justification: The project of interest is specified in the prompt and the text refers to it as the 'Parks/Salyer project'.

company_name.justification: The company is identified in the text as 'Arizona Sonoran Copper Company Inc. (TSX:ASCU | OTCQX:ASCUF) (“ASCU” or the “Company”)'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The text states: 'George Ogilvie, Arizona Sonoran President and CEO stated...'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article does not describe an acquisition of interest in the Parks Salyer project. The transaction described is for the separate MainSpring property. The text states the company already has a '100%-owned Parks/Salyer deposit'.

primary_commodity.justification: The company is described as an 'emerging US-based copper developer', which aligns with the authoritative metadata.

verified_article_link.justification: The article does not describe an M&A transaction for the Parks Salyer project. It details the acquisition of the adjacent 'MainSpring property' by Arizona Sonoran Copper Company Inc.

currency.justification: The purchase price for the related MainSpring property transaction is explicitly stated in US dollars: 'The total purchase price for the property is US$14 million...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The cash payment of US$14 million (sum of US$1M, US$2M, US$5M, and US$6M) is for the acquisition of the MainSpring property, not the Parks Salyer project.

share_payments_raw.justification: No share payments are mentioned in the transaction terms.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction described is purely cash-based, but it is for the MainSpring property, not the Parks Salyer project.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters is mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No exploration commitment value is mentioned in the text.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) is mentioned as part of the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text provides an area of '523 acres' for the acquired MainSpring property, not for the Parks Salyer project. A combined area for the 'Cactus and Parks/Salyer project' is given as 5,368 acres, but no standalone area for Parks Salyer is provided.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No standalone area for the Parks Salyer project is provided in the text.

resource_size.justification: The text mentions an 'existing Parks/Salyer and Cactus resource base' but does not provide any specific quantified mineral resource estimate for the Parks Salyer project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text identifies the company as 'Arizona Sonoran Copper Company Inc. (TSX:ASCU | OTCQX:ASCUF)'. The primary TSX listing is used.
